title: Matrix Center for the Advancement of Social Equity and Inclusion Operating Fund
description: To provide operational support of the Matrix Center at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs, including but not limited to: Knapsack Institute, lectures, receptions, White Privilege Conference, employee salaries, rent & operating supplies.
marketingContent: To provide operational support of the Matrix Center at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs, including but not limited to: Knapsack Institute, lectures, receptions, White Privilege Conference, employee salaries, rent & operating supplies.
